word:
MANY INSTANCES MIGHT BE MENTIONED IN WHICH PROPHETIC FORESIGHT WAS GIVEN TO MRS. WHITE. OFTEN SHE SAW IN VISION PERSONS WITH WHOM SHE WAS NOT ACQUAINTED. LATER IN HER TRAVELS SHE WOULD MEET THESE INDIVIDUALS, AND GIVE THEM MESSAGES THAT HAD BEEN
251
GIVEN HER IN VISION FOR THEM--MESSAGES REVEALING A KNOWLEDGE OF THEIR ACTIONS OR MOTIVES WHICH SHE COULD NOT HAVE RECEIVED FROM ANY HUMAN SOURCE.
